track.name: Roller Skates
comments: This is the song that got me into Steel Pulse [3]
Stealing the show people watching him show-off with stolen radio....... Calling all detectives.......crime don't pay!!!!!   RIB IT'''''''''''
Great sounding Reggae! We need more of these today!!!
This is the song that got me into Steel Pulse [2]
Life without music, i can't cope!
possibly my favorite reggae song, i remember dancing around my van with my girlfriend, subs blasting at a rest stop in ohio to celebrate just getting out of indiana (police state) lol
i'm gonna get him...the last thing i do.
never could work out why the guy grabbed the radio after smashing it ? what use was it ?...love the track though, in fact the whole "Earth Crisis"  album
This is the song that got me into Steel Pulse
love it, makes me feel happy! :)
